<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Coordination](/Feats.aspx?ID=1641) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4); [Inspire Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=188)

</column>

---

Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line. If your next action is to cast the [_inspire defense_](/Spells.aspx?ID=387) composition cantrip, you can [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), and one ally who gains a status bonus from the spell can immediately use a reaction to Raise a Shield.
name: Defensive Coordination
